column5: A buddy of mine is trying to convince me to head up to Percy's Reach with him for walleye opener. He seems pretty dead set on this place. I've never fished it before and a google search brought up some old threads from here with mixed reviews, but none were that recent. Does anyone have any expeirence fishing here? Or should I suggest going to another place? Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.
That would not be my first choice, Rice might be a better bet. OR Quinte.

Not so many walleyes there; however, pike fishing is good on the opener. The best place â€“ close to Percy Boom Haven, just around a Heron Island (big willow tree with heron nests) . For Walleyes you would rather go to lake St. John (Casino Rama)
Fished it a ton back in the day. Wouldn't be my first choice for walleye either. Great Bass, pike tho
